name: Cluttered Catacombs
description:
Defend yourself from monsters that ambush you. Trace connecting items to add them to your resources every turn. Upgrade your equipment to become more powerful and survive the catacombs.

You are an adventurer who is trying to escape from the catacombs that you are trapped in. On your way out, monsters try to stop you. You must use the items laying on the ground to fight back. There are four species you can choose to play as.

The only input is the mouse. There is no sound.
